short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your favorite Twitch streamers, get instant notifications when they come online, and much more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our extension is a convenient manager of your favorite channels. You can track the broadcast status, the number of viewers, and much more in real time. it is possible to enable notification of a new stream. all settings are made in a convenient window
